txt.en:
'This will not be easy news to deliver to Nykr's next of kin. I would do so myself, but my duties here prevent me from leaving.

'I suppose you will have to do it! There is much honour in performing this duty.

'His cousin Kúli is, as Kafli mentioned, the only member of Nykr's kin that I can think of who came with us to the Mines. You will likely find him to the south-east, at the Chittering Hole, studying the creatures there.'
'Aye, friend [placeholder]? How may I be of service?\n\n'Nykr dead! Alas, that is a tragedy beyond bearing. He was friend to many, reliable, kind...it will not be easy to spread this sad news.'
'Kuli is out studying the creatures at the Chittering Hole.'
The sad news of Nykr's passing must be delivered to his next of kin, a dwarf by the name of Kúli, who is studying spider behaviour.
Talk to Kúli at the Chittering Hole
Kuli is at the Chittering Hole, south-east of the Orc-watch.\n\nRóarr asked you to find Kúli at the Chittering Hole and deliver to him the news of Nykr's death.
